org.dcm4chex.archive.dcm.mppsscu.MPPSEmulatorService

Define AETs of Stations/Modalities for which MPPS messages shall be emulated. For each AET a minimal delay time in seconds (##s) or minutes (##m) between receive of the first object of the last series and MPPS generation must be specified. Format: AET1:delay1[:AET2:delay2][..]
StationAETsWithDelay java.lang.String
Interval for polling for new received Series from configured Stations/Modalities. The interval can be specified in seconds (##s) or minutes (##m). NEVER = disable MPPS emulation.
